- Interior vinyl horizontal blinds; beige in color; mounted in window opening.
- Damaged/slats bent and a section appears detached near the center-right; creates light gap.
- Light and privacy compromised due to broken slat; cords visible at sides.
- Window sill and bottom track show dust/dirt buildup; minor paint wear at frame edge.
- No visible glass cracks; no condensation observed. Cords present; ensure proper cord management for safety.
